Class ReplyDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spring.project.reply.dao.ReplyDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplyDAO

    @Repository
public class ReplyDAOImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReplyDAO
    ReplyDAO의 구현체
    댓글 테이블과 관련된 CRUD를 처리한다.
    Author:
    adm
